name: PositionCommon
description: A library of helper functions for creating position and vector objects.
overview: Accessible from scripts via the global `PositionCommon` variable.

methods.name: createVec
methods.signature: createVec(double x1, double y1, double z1, double x2, double y2, double z2)
methods.description: Creates a new 3D vector object representing the direction and magnitude from a starting point to an ending point.

methods.name: createVec
methods.signature: createVec(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
methods.description: Creates a new 2D vector object representing the direction and magnitude from a starting point to an ending point.

methods.name: createLookingVector
methods.description: Creates a normalized Vec3D (a vector with a length of 1) that represents an entity's direction of sight.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The entity whose direction of sight will be used.

methods.name: createLookingVector
methods.description: Creates a normalized Vec3D (a vector with a length of 1) from yaw and pitch angles.

parameters.name: yaw
parameters.description: The horizontal rotation angle in degrees. Positive values rotate clockwise when looking from above (0° = positive Z direction).

parameters.name: pitch
parameters.description: The vertical rotation angle in degrees. Positive values look downward, negative values look upward (0° = horizontal).

methods.name: createPos
methods.signature: createPos(double x, double y, double z)

methods.name: createPos
createBlockPos
methods.signature: createBlockPos(int x, int y, int z)
methods.description: Creates a new BlockPosHelper for the given integer coordinates.
